com.wedriveu.mobile.util.location

Interface LocationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocationServiceImpl

    public interface LocationService
    Handles the user location based on the phone GPS module.

      • checkSettings

        void checkSettings()
        Checks for needed settings change.

      • disableLocationService

        void disableLocationService()
        Disables location and resets the last known position.

      • onActivityResult

        void onActivityResult(int requestCode,
                      int resultCode,
                      android.content.Intent data)
        This method must be called from the main Activity to handle Settings change.
        Parameters:
        requestCode - Activity request code
        resultCode - Activity result code
        data - Data to pass to the View Model Fragments in order to handle the view

      • onRequestPermissionsResult

        void onRequestPermissionsResult(int requestCode,
                                java.lang.String[] permissions,
                                int[] grantResults)
        This method must be called from the main Activity to handle requestPermission call.
        Parameters:
        requestCode - Activity request code
        permissions - Array of user permissions requested by the app
        grantResults - Array of results based on the user permission choices

      • addLocationListener

        void addLocationListener(LocationServiceListener listener)
        Method to add the listener in order to the user location changes
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener passed to handle the location changes
